content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: bowl
inventory=[{"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 27, "index": 15}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 17, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 42}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a bowl I need to craft acacia_planks. To craft acacia planks, I need to place 1 stripped_acacia_wood in the crafting grid, which is currently in slot 29. Therefore, I will move the stripped_acacia_wood to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bowl
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 27, "index": 15}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 17, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 42}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: The acacia_planks have been crafted and I will now move them to a free slot in the inventory (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: bowl
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 27, "index": 15}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 17, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 42}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a bowl, I need to place three wooden planks in the shape of a V in the crafting grid. I will start by moving a wooden plank from slot 30 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bowl
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 27, "index": 15}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 17, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 42}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: Next, I need to place another wooden plank below the one I just placed. I will move a wooden plank from slot 11 into slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bowl
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 27, "index": 15}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 17, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 42}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I need to place the last wooden plank to the right of the two I just placed. I will move a wooden plank from slot 11 into slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bowl
inventory=[{"type": "bowl", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 27, "index": 15}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 22, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "jungle_door", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 17, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 42}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the bowl has been crafted, I need to move it out of the crafting grid and into my inventory. I will move all four bowls from slot 0 into slot 12.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
